choices: The classic - you're a human who's been mysteriously sent to the Pokemon world!
You're a citizen of Juniper Town, who may or may not want to join the guild.
You're an outlaw, who opposes the guild at every opportunity!
You're already a member of the guild, and part of an established team.
You're the leader of the guild!
1.content:
[Embed For Use By Upgraded+]


In the spirit of adventure, this particular Exploration Guild doesn't restrict itself to a single town... instead, the guild itself is located on a giant ship, capable of sailing the seven seas! They use an ancient, psychic Sigilyph on board to divine exactly what part of the world needs its help the most, and then the entire guild sails there, dropping its anchor on the shore and dispatching its members to help the hapless townsfolk of whatever land they've traveled to! For the Pokemon of the world, seeing those familiar sails approach over the horizon is a beacon of hope.

Just today, it's anchored at the docks of a beautiful new small town - Juniper Town! Once known for its beautiful flowers and agriculture, the town now more closely resembles a mountainous desert, almost unrecognizable from what it once was. It seems that the town has been experienced an extreme drought for quite a while now, ever since they heard a strange roar in the nearby mountains. Rumor has it that Groudon might be involved! This town definitely needs someone to help fix their drought problem, or one day, it might escalate into a whole famine!

And that's where you come in! You'll be dropped into this world as one of its mystical Pokemon inhabitants, and either try and save the world, or just eek out a living however you can. Before we can get to that, though, we'll have to establish what kind of Pokemon you are...
1.title: Trouble in Juniper Town!

11.content:
Just like in the beginning of many PMD games, you're a regular human who's found themselves transformed mysteriously overnight, and plopped right down into a grand world consisting entirely of Pokemon! The best thing about this setup is that you can focus all on exploring the world, without being restricted by your character's history. Please restrict the options to this list of possible species:

https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/...

Speaking of which, what kind of Pokemon, exactly, shall you transform into?
11.title: Human in a Strange World

111.content: ** Images For Use By Upgraded+ Only **
111.title: Vulpix

choices: He pointed you to Juniper Town
He helped you get used to life as a Pokemon
1112.content:
You live an idyllic life out in the countryside… or at least, you did. But recently, your farm has been being disrupted by nothing less than… UFOs! It seems like all the time recently, you’ve been seeing strange green lights outside, almost like stars.

But nobody believes you… and to be fair, you haven’t really been able to catch any photographic evidence at all… but you’re not crazy or anything! There really is something strange going on around your humble light farm!

It all came to a head when, one night, while you were trying to sleep, you heard a strange noise outside… and a powerful, green light started pouring through the window! Started, you wake from your bed… only to be somehow mesmerized by that green light.

In a tired daze, you stumble over to the window, staring out into that endless green expanse, until your mind grows foggy and all you can see is that shiny green…

Eventually, that green all faded away… and the floor seemingly collapsed from under you! You were knocked out of your trance all of a sudden, only for your heart to suddenly sink into your chest when you saw where you suddenly were… somewhere above a strange continent, hundreds of meters above the ground!

“No, no, no, no!” You panicked, your heart pounding in your chest as you suddenly started falling down to the ground.

You had no idea what was going on, or why you were suddenly so high in the air all of a sudden! All you could do was brace yourself for what you assumed to be certain death. Indeed, you landed with such force that the nearby trees were blown over by the sheer crater you formed…

But to your surprise, you were… still alive? You let out a long groan, your heart still racing and soreness and nausea wracking your body…

Eventually, you hear noises all around you, like faint footsteps and a voice. All you can think is, thank goodness… someone’s coming to rescue me! “Oh dear! Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear! Just a sliver of health left…”

You heard a voice, as somebody poked and prodded you. “Here, eat these! They’ll make you feel better…” With that, they brought a huge, blue berry to your lips, and without much other options, you started weakly chowing down…

Believe it or not, they actually worked! Just eating that berry, you could feel a lot of the pain going away, and your strength returns to you. After they let you chomp down on a second one, you feel just about as good as new, aside from some soreness and a headache.

Finally, you got a good glimpse of your attacker… but instead of a human, it was some monster you’ve never seen before! Some kind of plump, yellow rodent creature, standing on two legs!

“Eek! What are-” You stutter… only to realize you’re not human anymore either! Your whole body feels different… and when you look down, you’re a monster like him! Some four-legged creature, with many tails, and covered in fur!

To your horror, you realize this monster must be one of those extraterrestrials… and he had transformed you into one of them! “Nooo! Turn me back! Turn me back! I don’t wanna be an alien!” You immediately cry.

The creature seemed rather taken aback. “What? What’s an alien?” He asked, confused, as if wondering if something was wrong with your head. “Well, whatever it is, you’re not one of em. You’re a vulpix!”

You paused, even more confused than he was. “... a… vulpix?”

“You know… a Pokemon…?” He explained, incredulous, as if this much obvious. “You really trying to say you never noticed you were a vulpix before? Are you… sure you didn’t hit your head in that fall?”

A… a Pokemon? You’d heard of those things… seen them in commercials… but you assumed that it was just some dumb game for kids! If you really were a Pokemon, though… that clinches it! This all just HAD to be a dream!

You try to calm yourself down, convincing yourself you must be having a very vivid and disturbing dream. It would all be over soon… there was nothing to be afraid of… “So… if I’m a vulpix… then what kind of Pokemon are you?”

He smiles, proudly patting that pot belly of his. “Why, I’m a pikachu, of course!” You nod. Well, you’ve heard of those, at least. “And my name’s Andre! What’s your’s?”

You pause… before reaching up a paw, and letting the ‘pikachu’ pull you up to your feet, and you wobble a bit trying to keep your balance on four feet. Already, you were missing having hands. “My name’s Kristina… it’s, uh, nice to meet you, I suppose…”

The pikachu did seem to have nursed you back to health, and for that, you were thankful… but he still seemed eager to help even more.
1112.title: Not in Kansas Anymore

choices: You agree to live with him. He seems like he knows what he's doing.
You want to explore the world all on your own!
11122.content:
“So… like, how hard did you hit your head?” He asked, seeming fascinated by just how you seemed to fall from the sky, with all your memories apparently wiped away. “Like… do you remember anything about yourself at all? Aside from your name?”

You considered telling him the truth… but figured it’d just make him think you’re a lunatic. “No, not at all…” You eventually lie, deciding to just play the part of some hopeless amnesiac, in the hopes that’ll get him to give you more info about this world. “I don’t even remember what those berries you’re carrying are…”

He looked down at one of the blue berries he’d taken from his satchel. “Oh, these are Oran Berries! They’ll restore your health lickity split! Well, at least for weaker Pokemon like us. For stronger Pokemon, these aren’t very useful…” He pauses. “Wait, if you don’t remember you were a vulpix, does that mean you don’t remember your moves?”

You tilt your head. “My what?”

“Jeez! You’ve forgotten how to do all of your moves? That’s a problem…” He immediately seemed concerned, and you grew a little worried yourself. Eventually, though, he snapped his fingers with a smile. “Well, there’s one move I can teach you right now! Here, just try to jump at me.”

“... huh?”

“Jump at me! Hit me with your whole body! C’mon, I can take it!” He braced himself, with a look of dedication on his face. You were unsure, but you eventually do as he says, rearing back… and sending yourself flying right at him, preparing to hit him with a body slam!

You jumped right at his pot belly… and in return, you suddenly bounce off all that soft flesh! “Oof!” Your attack completely backfires as his fluffy belly sends you flying backwards, wincing as you land right in the dirt. “Jeez… that thing is more dangerous than it looks!”

“Heh… yeah, sorry. It can be pretty bouncy…” He blushed, sheepishly, as he poked his plump tummy. Getting his head back in the game, though, he turned so that his side was now facing you. “Again! This time, let’s try it from the side!”

You sigh, but still rear back… and send yourself flying right at him again! This time, your body slam seems to really get him, and he’s knocked over onto his back with a start. “Agh… that was a good one! You’re getting the hang of this!” He compliments, sitting up.

You keep training for a while, getting more and more agile as you practice this bodyslam move on various rocks, trees, and of course, the raichu. Soon, you don’t even bounce off his belly anymore! “Alright, I think you’ve just about mastered it,” he smiled, patting you on the head. “Congrats! You’ve officially learned the move Tackle!”

You pause, not realizing that that very simple move apparently had a name. “Tackle?” You raise a brow. “Uh… how many of these ‘moves’ are there, anyway?”

“Oh, probably, like, thousands! Here, check this one out!” He smiled, turning to a nearby tree… before, to your surprise, his cheeks start to glow with static! You jump, startled, as a burst of electricity suddenly flows from his cheeks right at the tree, burning off some of its bark with thunderous power!

“WHOA!” You gasp, your eyes wide at the sheer show of power! It was like something out of star wars or something…! “You just… shot lightning… from your…”

“I know! That one’s Thunder Shock. Cool, right?” He smiled, crossing his arms proudly, seeming to enjoy just how awed you were by that simple move. “If you keep training, you’ll eventually learn moves that let you breathe fire and stuff!”

Breathe fire…? You could hardly imagine spitting fire like a dragon… but hey, this is a dream, probably, and all sorts of crazy things happen in dreams. If being a Pokemon means that you can unlock all sorts of crazy powers… maybe you should savor this while it lasts.

“So… are you the only other Pokemon?” You eventually ask him curiously, wondering if there are any other unique monsters like him out there.

“Oh, absolutely not! There’s thousands and thousands of different Pokemon out there!” Andre shook his head, tugging his satchel back over his shoulder. “There’s a bunch of really friendly ones back at the town I come from, Juniper Town. If you want, I can offer you a place to stay for awhile while you get your bearings…”
11122.title: Learning Tackle, and other feats

choices: He offered you a tour of around the town!
He offered to help train you to learn new moves!
111221.content:
You just ponder it for a bit. Looking at him, the strange ‘pikachu’ boy did look pretty cute, in his own way, you had to admit. And he certainly seemed like the friendly sort. You really did need someone to help you figure out this crazy new world...

“Alright, I… suppose I don’t really have anywhere else to go…” You eventually nod your head, much to his satisfaction. It was pretty much your only option, after all, and to be honest, you wanted to learn a little more about Andre, despite the fact that he might just be a character of a dream.

“Ah, cool! I haven’t really had guests over in a while, so my house might be a little messy,” he smiled, excitedly standing up, that tail flicking behind him. “But hey, I think it’s a cozy enough little place~ C’mon!” With that, he turned around and head into the wilderness, with you trailing slowly behind.

You didn’t know exactly what to expect, but when you finally emerged onto the streets of Juniper Town, you could only be stunned by what you saw! All around you… were monsters of all shapes and sizes, every sort of critter you could imagine, all setting up shops, eating at cafes, chatting and coexisting!

“Whoa!” You said, glancing all around. It seemed like every time you turned your head, you’d lay eyes on a new and fascinating creature. “That’s a… lot of Pokemon…”

“Mhmm! It’s the biggest town in the area! All kinds of friendly faces around here… and some less-than-friendly ones… but you don’t gotta worry about those!” He smiled, before stopping before one small, simple wooden home, identical to many of the others. “And heeere we are! My humble little home!”

He unlocked it with a simple little key from his satchel, and you finally got to peer in. Definitely didn’t look as comfortable as human homes… a bed that was just a pile of some wooly fluff, a fireplace, a table… it seemed to lack most of the amenities of modern life. These Pokemon were a simple sort. “Well… you were right. It does look cozy enough.”

“Thank you for noticing!” He giggled, before walking over to the dining area, such as it is. “Now, I was just about to eat when I saw you landing. I think I’ll reward myself for that daring rescue with a nice, filling lunch… care for some yourself?”

“Yeah, I could use a bite to eat…” You nod. You watch him take a bunch of berries from his satchel, and use them to cook a big, delicious-smelling strew on the fireplace. It looked like a huge meal! You had no idea how the two of you were going to eat it all!

He spilled half of the stew into your bowl, and half into his… but it still looked like a massive meal! The bowl was almost as big as your entire body! You look down at it, stunned… but when you look up, he was already chugging his bowl down with apparent ease, bulge after bulge sliding down his throat!

You watch in sheer awe, your eyes widening. He wasn’t really going to… finish the whole thing in one gulp, was he? But sure enough, he took a bowl as big as you entire body… and gulped down the entire stew in just a single, long slurp! Only to let out a relaxed sigh when he plopped the now empty bowl back down again.

He raised a brow. “What’s the matter? You haven’t even touched your’s yet!” You stare down in awe at this belly, which was now even bigger than before! In fact, it was absolutely huge! He looked stuffed to the limit, with his belly bouncing and sloshing with even movement, churning and squishing as it was pressed against the table.

You had no idea how he could act so casual, when he looked stuffed to the absolute limit! “Wha- buh…” You stuttered, stunned. “You… you just emptied that whole bowl in one gulp! H-how…?”

“Oh! Hehe!” He smiled, reaching down and kneading that big, fluffy, squishy tummy of his with a hand. “That’s hardly even a big meal! It was really just a light lunch. Stomachs are super flexible, you know! Mine isn’t even halfway full…”

You were mesmerized by the sight of it slosh and jiggle. “Can I… touch it…?” You asked absent-mindedly, only to blush when you realize what you just said.

“It would be my pleasure!” He smiled widely, moving forward and pushing his belly out for you to enjoy. You hesitated, but… you couldn’t help but bring up your forepaws, and start to rub and knead that huge, gurgling tum. It was… so… soft… so squishy… so fluffy… you could hardly believe it!

Before you knew it, you were pressing your cheek up against it, resting your ear against it just to listen to it slosh and churn as it squeezes around the shifting contents packed away within. “Hehe… I’m flattered you like my tummy so much, but your stew is getting cold!” He smiled. “Go on, chow down! Trust me, you’ll love it!”

Curiously, you take a seat on one of the simple wooden chairs, leaning forward to take a sip of his homemade stew… only for it to taste absolutely delightful! You just have to keep going, slurping up the delicious berry stew at a faster and faster rate…

Sure enough, as you ate, you could feel your stomach start to… swell. You could feel your meal start to push at the walls of your stomach as you filled yourself up, but inside of being painful, it just felt… good. Almost like you just wanted to stretch your stomach out as big as possible…!

You were almost in a hypnotic trance until, at last, you were disappointed when you realized you’d drank all the stew. But then you looked down… and noticed your own belly was absolutely enormous! You reached down, poking and prodding at it as you could feel every little bit of the stew slosh and shift around inside.

With a giggle, the raichu moved forward… and pressed his own, similarly sized tummy against yours! You let out a light gasp as both of the big, sloshy, gurgly bellies were squished together, sloshing around their contents as you were treated to the sound of two cute, powerful stomachs gurgling and digesting. “See? I told you so!” He giggled.

You spent the next while together, feeling eachother’s tummies and talking about all the lovely cuisine native to this region. You had no idea you’d ever like this sort of thing, but feeling your own tummy swell and slosh with food, and being able to rub and massage the cute pikachu’s similarly round belly… it was just super fun and cozy!

But you couldn’t just sit around doing that all day. Before you knew it, your belly had shrunk to the point that you could move easily again, and you and Andre had to contemplate what to do next...
111221.title: Your First BIG Meal!

choices: You check out the eating contest.
You have to talk to that haxorus!
1112211.content:
“If I’m going to be staying here… I should get used to the town, right?” You tilt your head, figuring that you might as well start with the basics.

“Oh, you want me to give you a tour? Well, why didn’t you just say so?” He smiles, proudly laying a paw on his chest. “Giving tours is one of my many specialties! I assure you, you’ll know this whole town like the back of your paw in no time~!”

And with that, you were out the door! You blushed a bit, finding it embarrassing to be walking around with such an engorged belly swaying beneath you, but looking around, you noticed a lot of Pokemon around here seemed similarly full. Guess it must be around lunch time.

You spend most of your time asking about the Pokemon you see, trying to mesmerize the names Andre tells you so you can remember all the species and types there are out there. You were really impressed by the all the imagination that went into these ‘Pokemon’ things. Eventually, you and Andre stop by a small, odd-looking circus tent.

“That over there is the Travelling Circus. It’s stopped in Juniper Town for a while, and it sells all of the best goods! It’s where I’ve been doing all my grocery shopping recently.” He says, which confused you somewhat. How can it be both a circus, and a grocery store? Or maybe it’s just a grocery store themed after a circus…”

“There are two places in town you can’t go to. The first is that big, fancy ship over there. That’s the Exploration Guild!” He says, pointing to a HUGE ship anchored at the docks of the town, with a strange symbol and its sails. “They hunt outlaws, rescue missing Pokemon, explore mystery dungeons… they’re, like, the coolest gang of adventurers ever!”

“Huh… they do sound pretty cool.” You ponder it. You feel like you could get up to some of your own adventures, yourself... “What’s the other place?”

“Oh, the other place is that noble district over there.” He smiles, pointing to an area up on a hill, that seems completely walled-off and opulent. “That’s where all the richest and most influential Pokemon around here hang out. You can’t go in unless you have an invitation. They like to keep all the riff raff out.”

Eventually, you lay eyes on something interesting. There was a haxorus there, a mountain of sharp metal, but his underside seemed to be comparatively smooth and soft. And, sure enough, his belly was poking out, distending wider than any you’ve seen so far… and it was moving and bulging like crazy!

“Whoa! What did that Pokemon eat?” Your eyes widened as you started it, wondering just what on earth you could eat around here that could make your belly wriggle like it had a mind of its own!

Confused, Andre turned to look, only to chuckle a bit. “Oh? Probably another Pokemon. Looks like a real wriggler, too,” he chuckled nonchalantly, patting his own belly.

In response, you were stunned! “They… they swallowed somebody?”

“Well, yeah! Don’t feel too bad for them, though. Leading your whole life just to become part of another Pokemon’s body… it’s the most noble way to go!” He said, just continuing to walk, acting like this whole thing was no big deal. Apparently this whole Pokemon world had a dark side…

You could hardly get your head around what you were seeing! You were just mesmerized by the look of the haxorus’ huge, bulging gut, knowing there’s actually another Pokemon alive and squirming in there. Guess there’s really nothing to be afraid of, if this is really all just a dream...

“Oh, hey! Look over there! One of those famous Juniper Town eating contests is about to start! I’ve got to check it out! Wanna come with?” Andre smiles, pointing to a nearby stage… but you hesitate on what you really want to do.
1112211.title: Exploring Juniper Town!

choices: Just spectate while Andre competes against someone else
11122111.content:
You shiver, trying to push the haxorus out of your mind. There’s no point in associating with Pokemon like that… especially since it seems that he has plenty of room for more! “Yeah, I’ll be right there, Andre!” You nod, chasing along after him as he makes his way to the town plaza.

The plaza seems to be fairly full, with tons of Pokemon around to watch all the contests onstage. It was a little awkward squeezing past all that fluff and fur, but eventually, you and Andre find spots to sit just in time for to catch the next show.

“On the left, we have the famous professional food taster, Nicholas!” The announcer declared. Sure enough, the feraligatr on the left looked like what you’d imagine a food taster would look like. You had to admit, he was pretty cute, what with that huge, round belly of his, especially as the obese gator laughs and shows it off to the adoring crowd. Some of his fangirls in the front are squealing with glee, and you’re almost tempted to join them.

“And on the right, we have his opponent… the leader of the Juniper Town gym, Rafael!” On the other side was a similar-sized charizard, who was quite muscular aside from his big, round, but still quite firm belly. They were both absolutely massive, and you couldn’t help but swoon a little at the side of them! This was going to be quite a show!

“This match’s victor shall be… the first to down 100 poffins!” Sure enough, the covers of the massive trays in front of the two men were removed, revealing massive piles of delicious poffins! You were in awe, concerned about whether they’d even be able to fit it all, but they just licked their lips, seemingly unafraid.

“Are we ready, folks? Say it with me, now… 3, 2, 1, EAT!”

With that, they were off! You’d never seen anything like it! Those two massive jaws just descended… and almost a half dozen of those big soft poffins disappeared into their powerful maws in a single instant! If you’d have blinked, you’d have completely missed just how fast they had gobbled them down.

Watching them go, you could tell why they were so fearless! These two were pure eating machines, to the point that it made your own slightly engorged belly look slightly paltry in comparison.They almost seemed to be moved in unison, swallowing their meals down with almost robotic efficiency, big chunks of the mountains of food in front of them disappearing in mere moments!

Their bellies just kept growing and growing, constricting powerfully around their meals to convert the poffins within them into a round, compact mass of dough. The way they moved their jaws, their throats, their bellies, it was almost an artform! Everything perfectly attuned to eat as much as possible, as quickly as possible…!

You were almost holding your breath as they were down to the last two dozen pastries, keeping a careful eye on every bite to see which one would emerge the victor…!

“And the winner is… RAFAEL!”

Sure enough, the charizard managed to take the last big bite just mere moments before the feraligatr would manage it. The big dragon would rear back with a smug grin on his face, letting out a loud, thunderous belch as he rubbed his belly, amidst the cheering of his adoring crowd! His belly was unbelievably huge, and yet he moved with ease…!

At least Nicholas seemed like a good sport. He turned and shook hands with the charizard, congratulating him on his victory, even kneading and massaging the charizard’s tummy for a moment as a show of good faith. With that, the feraligatr marched from the stage, leaving only the charizard, sitting in anticipation.

To your confusion, a whole other tray was brought out before the charizard. Was he really going to eat even more, after all that!

“And for our victor, this rounds reward is… a Delcatty!”

The charizard licked his lips as the tray was uncovered, to reveal an eager-looking delcatty smiling up at him. Meanwhile, you were in complete shock! He wasn’t able to just eat her, right on stage, right? What kind of crazy contest is this, where people are offered up as prizes?

Sure enough, it was just as you feared… the charizard was quickly lifting him up to her maw, her tongue gliding against her chin as the crowd swooned. You know you should look away, but you just can’t! The vision of the feline slipping deeper into the dragon’s warm, wet, powerful maw was just too mesmerizing!

You wonder how the delcatty could be so willing, knowing she was about to be devoured! But on the other hand, some strange part of you was a tiny bit envious. He did seem to be so very gentle, savoring his meal slowly and delicately, making sure to glide his tongue over inch of the delicious feline…

You blushed a bit as he seemed to pay particular attention to running his tongue over her thick rump, apparently finding the plumpness back there particularly squishy and tasty. But eventually, that too disappeared down his gullet, and eventually, the feline was completely sealed away in Rafael’s body.

You were in a daze, realizing you’d just witnessed a Pokemon’s last moment of seeing the outside world, before being doomed to the fate of food! But everybody just seemed so casual about it, even cheering for him as he let out one last huge belch, shaking his belly up and down and showing it off to the crowd!

“Pretty awesome show, right?” Andre happily elbowed you gently in the side as the charizard stood up and walked offstage, the delcatty’s body completely invisible beneath that pudge. She had been forgotten about completely, it seemed, just serving as the dragon’s food to make his gluttonous body even bigger.

With that, the announcer, a chatot, finally flew onstage. “Alright, folks! That wraps up this afternoon’s last pro match!” He announced. “We shall be beginning the more casual matches in a moment! If you’d like to participate in an eating contest, raise your paw now!”

Andre elbowed you in the side gently again. “Hey! You know what? We should totally try a match!”

You blushed at the thought of going out there in front of all those Pokemon, and potentially embarrassing yourself. Still, your mind was still completely dedicated to the match you just witnessed… “I dunno…”

“C’mooon, it’ll be fun!”
11122111.title: The Big Eating Contest

111221111.content:
Before you knew it, the pikachu was already eagerly raising his paw, and in the heat of the moment, you felt pressured to raise your paw too… only for your heart to leap in your chest as the chatot pointed to the two of you. “I see we have a new face in town! Come on up, newbie! Show everybody what you’re capable of!”

You were nervous as can be as you trotted up onto the stage alongside Andre, taking your places at the same seats the previous two contestants had. Watching the stage from the crowd was one thing, but actually being on the stage felt completely different! You were shaking a bit, knowing that all eyes on were on you.

You whispered your names to the chatot, and he cleared his throat as he opted to get this show on the road. “Alright! Here on our left, we have an old contestant, Andre…!” He got some cheers, as it seems Pokemon around here knew him, and in response, he happily showed off his own belly, using it as a drum.

“And on the left, we have our newbie, uhh… Kristina! Let’s all give her a warm welcome!” You blush a bit as everyone claps for you, all seeming rather interested in seeing what you can do. Well, at least it seemed like a nice crowd…

“And the winner shall be…” Your eyes widened as two big trays were plopped down in front of the both of you, your mind racing with possibilities, until finally the lids were taken off to reveal… “whoever’s first to eat 30 hot dogs!”

You gulp at the huge amount of freshly cooked hot dogs before you. You’d mostly digested your previous meal, but still, you don’t even know if you can fit all this food in your belly! “Hey, don’t be nervous! I’ll go easy on ya!” Andre smiled, trying to calm your nerves, only succeeding somewhat.

“Say it with me, folks...! 3, 2, 1, EAT!”

Well, there was no backing out now! You tried to ignore the eyes of the endless crowd, and instead focus on the meal in front of you. You immediately tried to shove as many hot dogs into your mouth as possible, until your cheeks were bloated out almost like a squirrel… only to wince a bit as you have to chew down to soften the chunk of meat in your mouth, swallowing it bit by bit.

You glance over and see that Andre was taking a more cautious approach, shoving three or four hot dogs into his mouth at a time and swallowing them whole. You decide to follow his example, bulge after bulge sliding down your throat as you gulp down the meat as fast as you could.

It wasn’t long until you were starting to feel the burn, as it were. Once you were halfway through the hot dogs, your belly was already bulging out as big and round as it was after that stew, and you already felt full and engorged. How were you going to make it through the other half…?

Your belly groaned and glurped, squished underneath you as it got rounder and rounder, as you could only do your best to keep filtering hot dogs down your throat, feeling each of them land in your stomach and shift around with the meat already tightly packed in there.

Meanwhile, the pikachu’s belly was expanding to similar sizes, but yet, he seemed much more accustomed to it. It hardly slow him down, rubbing his own gurgling belly with a paw while shoveling chunks of hot dog down his gullet with another hand, practically cooing at the flavor.

You had to keep up! You wanted to prove yourself in front of the entire town, in the hopes of making a good first impression. Win or lose, you have to give it your all! A look of dedication dawns on your face as you lift the tray up with your paws, and start to just let the hot dogs all slide down your throat at once, trying to choke them all down...
111221111.title: Battle of the Bellies

choices: You both visit a professional belly masseuse.
1112211112.content:
You let out a gasp for air as the last of the hot dogs finally disappeared down your throat! By now, your belly was so big that you were practically laying on top of it, resting on that compacted ball of meat churning within as your tummy is squished against the ground.

“And the winner is…” Your hold your breath as the drum roll plays. “Andre!”

You look up, surprised! … but glancing over at Andre, you can see what they mean. While you were obviously overburdened by just how stuffed you were, he seemed like an expert, casually running a hand over his absolutely engorged gut while picking at his teeth with a toothpick. “Ah~! My compliments to the chef!” He declares, proudly.

The whole crowd claps for him, while you just look down at your huge belly. This was going to make walking difficult for a while. You sigh as you poke and prod it, thinking that, if you’d have known Andre was going to win, you wouldn’t have stuffed yourself this bad…

Meanwhile, Andre strut around the stage a bit, lifting his belly up and letting it bounce and slosh in front of the crowd, who were all cheering openly for him. You weren’t upset that you lost or anything… and it was nice to be able to see Andre so happy!

You shake his paw, before starting to very slowly waddle offstage, your gut dragging along the crowd as you moved back towards the audience. However, he stayed onstage… and your heart skipped a beat when you saw another tray get brought out for him! You knew what that meant!

“And for our victor, this rounds reward is… a Buneary!”

Before your very eyes, the lid was removed, revealing a little rabbit sitting there, looking happily up at the hungry chu. You could only watch, wide-eyed, as he licked his lips at the sight of her, eventually causing the bunny to giggle as that tongue travelled over her cheeks and belly, tasting her like she was nothing but a meal!

Watching that charizard eat somebody had been awe-inspiring enough… but watching your new friend treat somebody like a snack? You didn’t quite know what to feel! All you knew is that you couldn’t look away, your cheeks burning red as he moved down to lick at her small paws, before finally sliding them into his maw…

She blushed openly, a dopey expression on her face as she rubbed the back of his head, as he started to feed her into his jaws feet-first, coated her in that warm saliva. You were starting to shiver a bit, seeing just how willing she was to slide right down that powerful throat, and become his simple meal…!

Her torso slipped in easily, and soon, only her head poked out of his maw. She was blushy as can be, and looked around, getting the last view of sunlight she’d ever get… before she was dragged down into darkness with another gulp, a bulge sliding down Andre’s throat until that, too, disappeared.

You were in absolute awe! Even after having already stuffed himself that much, he still had room to swallow somebody whole with ease… and she didn’t even end up making a bulge, instead just ending up tightly packed with the food already in there. That’s what she was… just food, just like all the hot dogs he’d eaten. He didn’t care about who she was, he just cared about how she gurgled away in his belly into yet more softness. Your heart fluttered at the thought of it all.

He let out a big, thunderous belch as he finally finished his meal, wriggling and squishing his belly for a while onstage, showing off just how easily he’d downed the… what was it again? Some kind of rabbit? Nobody even remembered… but it didn’t matter now. She was just a snack, ultimately.

The audience cheered as Andre walked offstage, and led you away from the whole contest. He let out another belch as he walked alongside you, rubbing his belly with his paws. “Urrrrp! Man, that was a great match! You did really good, I’m impressed!”

Meanwhile, all you could do was stare at his belly, trying to see any sign of the buneary inside… but you couldn’t. If you hadn’t seen her get swallowed with your own eyes, you’d have no idea she was in there. “You… you just… swallowed somebody…”

He chuckles, lifting his belly up and dropping it, just to let it bounce and jiggle somewhat, presumably sloshing the girl within around. “Yup! She was absolutely delicious! The perfect dessert after a big meal~”

However, you just remained silent, wide-eyed as you stared at his belly, not even knowing what to say. “... is something wrong?” Andre asked, raising a brow. “You know she was a volunteer, right? She wanted to get eaten.”

“I-I know… but…” You shuddered. “It’s still… crazy! Like… is there even any air in there?”

“Oh, yeah! There’s plenty enough air. It’s probably really dark and cramped, though,” he confessed, squishing his tummy with a paw. “She’s still moving around in there. You can feel my belly, if you want to feel it.”

You blushed wildly as he stopped, holding out his belly to you. Still, you couldn’t resist resting a paw against it, squishing down into that incredible softness… only to feel movement, hidden deep within. Your whole body shivered at the sensation. “W-whoa… she… she really is…”

“I could use a nice tummy rub to help her settle down, you know…” He smiled mischievously, seeing just how blushy you were. You somehow grew even more red, but still, you couldn’t help but bring your paws to his belly, and start kneading and massaging at that sensitive skin.

Eventually, you pressed your ear against it, listening to the sounds of gurgling and churning within that soft belly. “So you’re going to… digest her…?”

“Well, I mean. Yeah!” He shrugged, casually. “I know you might be new to this whole thing, but really, there’s nothing better than gurglin’ a Pokemon up into a nice, soft new layer of pudge~”

You shivered again at just how casually he was talking about this, as if other people were meals to him. “W-would you even eat… m-me?” You eventually couldn’t help but asked.

He smiled, leaning forward and licking his lips. “Well… I did think you were pretty tasty when I first met you!” He confessed. “I’d never eat you without permission… but if you ever feel like becomin’ some of my pudge, I’d be more than happy to oblige!”

“Yipe!” At this point, you were blushing so hard you had to lean back and cover your face with your paws, embarrassed!

“Hehe! Hey, it’s just an offer!” He giggled, wrapping an arm around your shoulder, leaning your head against his soft, squishy, fluffy gut. “I’m perfectly fine with you being my friend, instead of my snack! It’s all up to you!”

You… you had to stop thinking about this! This conversation was going to places you didn’t want it to go. You pull away, shaking your head, trying to reorient yourself. “I-I think we should just rest!” You say. “Find somewhere to digest all this… with all these hot dogs, I can barely move…”

But where to go?
1112211112.title: A Buneary for Dessert

choices: Ask Andre to find you a willing prey to eat.
11122111121.content:
"Why don't we head back to my place then?" Andre said. "Best way to digest a big meal like this is to get some sleep after all."

"Yeah, that sounds nice." You agreed, already feeling a food coma coming on, from the sheer amount of food you had in your belly.

"Hehe, alright then. Stick close to me, I'll lead the way home."

With that, the two of you began your walk back to Andre's house. All the way, you leaned on Andre for support, the heavy meal in your belly weighing you down a lot. But Andre seemed to be used to having such a full belly, as he wasn't slowed by it at all. In about 30 minutes however, you had arrived at Andre's home.

The inside was relatively plain, just like you remembered. Nothing seemed to have changed in the few hours you were gone.

Andre gestured to the bed. "Why don't you just take my bed for now? I'll make myself a second one to sleep on, it shouldn't take long."

"Thank you." You replied, feeling too tired to argue. You lied down in bed, and quickly fell asleep to the gurgling of your own belly.

You awoke to some loud snoring. Andre had made a second bed next to yours, and was sleeping soundly in it, snoring very loudly. Feeling a bit thirsty, you decided to get out of bed to get some water. After getting up, you took a quick look at yourself. You had mostly finished digesting your dinner, and had gained quite a few pounds as a result. You waddled your newly padded body over to the jar of water that Andre kept in his house.

As you took your drink, you couldn't help but remember the events from the eating contest. The memory played over and over again in your mind, seeing that buneary slide down your new friend's throat, into his hungry stomach. You couldn't help but imagine what it was like for her... packed into his already stuffed stomach with the rest of his meal. The walls holding her tight, hugging her until she finally fell asleep... And by now, she was nothing but Pikachu pudge.

As you finished your drink of water, you felt refreshed. And you had made up your mind as well.

You decided that, in the morning you would...
11122111121.title: You rest at his house.

choices: Andre mentions a restaurant with live meals.
Andre can't think of anywhere, but...
111221111211.content:
You decided then that you needed to try to eat a Pokemon. As you were looking yourself over, you realized that you liked all of the weight you had gained from your massive meal. But one look at Andre told you that he had gained far more than you did, despite eating about the same amount of hot dogs. He had simply done it faster. You then realized that the reason he had gained so much more than you, was because of the Buneary! To think one little Pokemon could make such a difference.

But your conscience still told you that this was a bad idea. A Pokemon that got eaten didn't come back after all. So you made a compromise with yourself, and decided that you would only do it if the other Pokemon was willing. That way you would be doing them a favor... or something.

With that, you returned to your bed, your mouth already beginning to drool. Just thinking about it was making you hungry. You drifted off to sleep, dreaming of the delicious Pokemon you would find tomorrow.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----

You awoke in the morning to the sounds of Andre moving around.

"Morning sleepyhead! Sleep well I assume?" He chuckled in response to his own joke.

"Yeah, it was the best night's sleep I've gotten in awhile." You replied sleepily.

"Well, that's good. Hey, it's almost noon, and I'm getting pretty hungry. You want to go find something to eat?"

As if in response to his question, your stomach growled loudly. "Hehe, yeah. Actually, I wanted to ask you something."

He looked at you curiously. "Yeah, what's up?"

You broke eye contact with him and blushed. It felt embarrassing to ask, but you finally managed to say "I was wondering if there was a way to find willing meals? I'm... actually really curious."

"Oh, you want to try being a predator huh?" He put a paw to his chin. "Willing meals... lemme think..."
111221111211.title: Ask Andre to find you a willing prey to eat.

1112211112112.content:
"I can't think where we could get someone right away," Andre pondered. "But I think I might have an idea."

The thought that you might be starting the day off by eating someone was making your heart race. "You do?"

"Maybe, let's go and see," He turned for the door and following after him the two of you left the house. Based on the lack of activity on the streets the two of you must have woken up fairly early, the morning sun feeling warm on your fur. Walking through the village you passed some of the locations Andre showed you the day before until you came to a plaza that had streets stretching off to different parts of the small town. You kept following him until he came to a stop before a large wooden board plastered with notes and letters. "I didn't end up showing you this yesterday but this is the village's main bulletin board. People usually post announcements or requests for help but every now and then you can find someone advertising themselves instead."

"They do? They really just put up a note and let whatever stranger that sees it come and eat them?" you asked in disbelief. The concept that people enjoyed getting eaten in this world was still strange to you and it was even stranger to learn that they post up notices to get someone to devour them. You started getting anxious as you realized that in this case the one answering the advertisement would be you.

"Yep. Those types of posts tend to get taken pretty quickly so there's a chance we might not find anything. Let's have a look though!" Andre said. With that, the both of you were scanning the board and just like he said there were requests for assistance; lots of them.. There were posts about missing Pokemon or bounties for rampaging outlaws to more simpler things like a request for a specific type of berry. Your eyes skimmed from paper to paper as you tried to find the right one and you noticed somewhere along the way that the town was starting to wake up. The sound of Pokemon talking filled the plaza as they all started their daily routines and made their way to wherever they had to be. Having scanned through half the board with no success you were starting to get skeptical, especially when the other odd Pokemon joined in and occasionally took one of the many pieces of paper.

"Oh, there!" Andre exclaimed. With a jump the Pikachu snatched the notice from the board and read through it, walking a short distance away from the small crowd forming at the bulletin board. You eagerly awaited his verdict as his eyes scanned from line to line until he eventually let out a chuckle. "Well, we found one," he said while turning the letter to you. You quickly learned why Andre chuckled when you read that the author of the note was a Vulpix, just like you. He stated that he was a male and that he wanted a relatively small Pokemon to eat him, citing Pokemon like Espeon or Umbreon as an example. The rest of the note made you blush as it went into great detail on how he wants to be tightly squished inside a stomach before it abruptly ends with a short 'thank you'.

"So what do you think?" Andre asked. "For a first-timer it might be a tad difficult but I think you'll do alright."

"I don't know, maybe?" You replied, eyes glossing over the note again. The fact it was another Vulpix made you hesitant. Considering the culture of this strange world you guessed that cannibalism was a concept they're not too worried about but that wasn't why you were uncertain. Being one yourself you knew that he would be roughly the same size as you and while you fit the 'small Pokemon' category he wanted you were skeptical if you could even get him down. If you went through with it you would literally be eating your entire body weight in a single bite! Then again, Andre seemed confident that you could do it and you did see him eat a Buneary that was roughly his own size so maybe it was possible?

"Yay or nay? We could always go and try to find a smaller Pokemon if you're not up to it. There are a few Pokemon I know that might be interested."

You thought about it for a moment.
1112211112112.title: The bulletin board

11122111121121.content:
After thinking about it you nodded. "Yeah, let's go meet him."

Andre lightly laughed. "I guess if you don't eat him someone else will, let's go!"

Trailing closely behind the Pikachu you followed him to where the note said to meet the Vulpix. As the two of you walked you noticed that all the small houses and buildings were becoming more and more spread out, the treeline of a nearby forest coming into view. A few moments later after getting closer to woodlands Andre suddenly began veering off into the forest. Considering he knows this town you followed him without a word, assuming that it must be where the Vulpix was. Most of the vegetation in the area was brown and orange as if it was Autumn, dry leaves crunching under your paws as he lead you further to a small clearing. Either this world had seasons like your world or this place was exceptionally dry, either way the area had a beauty about it as leaves intermittently floated down to the ground around you.

Andre stopped and turned to you with an enthusiastic smile. "Hey, wait here for a minute and I'll go grab him, his place isn't too far from here. I'll tell him where you are and that you're waiting for him."

"What, you're not going to stay with me?" you asked, slightly worried. "What if something happens?"

"It's your first time!" he exclaimed. "The first one's always special so I thought i'd leave you two alone. If anything happens I'll hear it from nearby but I think you'll do fine."

"Well, if you think so..."

"Yep, the only advice I can give you is to use gravity. Just wait right here," he said. Andre suddenly turned and went back the way you came and soon he disappeared behind the trees. Now alone, your heart was nearly beating out of your chest and you decided to plant your haunches on the ground as you waited. You couldn't help but shift and shuffle as you sat, the nervousness you were feeling was intense as if you were waiting for a date that may or may not show. You really didn't want to mess up; Andre made it look easy but you were really not sure how it would go down and the fact that you would be doing it without his guidance made you even more unsure. Shaking your head you tried to think of the assuring words he left you with and his confidence that you would do fine alone.

A short while later the sound of crunching leaves caught your attention and you turned to see the Pokemon that you would be eating, his eyes nervously darting side to side as he slowly approached. Everything from his rusty-red fur to his six tales looked exactly like yours, the only difference between the two of you being the parts sitting between your hind legs. When he approached closed enough he sat down with you and from the way his chest was rapidly rising up and down as he breathed you assumed he must be as anxious as you were. "Um, hello," he timidly greeted.

The fact that he was equally as nervous made you feel a bit better. Offering a smile you greeted him,"hey."

"You're the Pokemon that's, uh-" he trailed off for a moment as he looked to the side, a blush clearly visible through his red fur. "-Going to eat me?"

"Um, yeah," you mumbled while giving an embarrassed smile. The two of you sat in silence for a moment as you both eyed each other until he gained the courage to speak up first.

"You're pretty," he said before he quick became flustered. "Er, what I mean is that I..."

"Thanks!" you said, a blush covering your face. You remembered what the two of you were really here for so you try and steer the conversation in the right direction. "Okay, this is my first time, so..."

"It is?" the Vulpix boy blurted out with a smile. "That's great! I was told that predators always remember their first."

"That so?" you chuckle. The word 'predator' stood out to you as you realized that in this scenario, you definitely were just that. "Are you sure about this, though?"

"Absolutely, I've been thinking about this a lot."

"Well, if your sure. How do you think we should start? you asked him.

"Um, maybe my paws first?" he said as he lifted up his arms. Cupping your own paws under his you could feel his weight and you stayed like that for a moment as you psyched yourself up. After all, it was new territory for the both of you, though, when you thought about it he wouldn't be able to experience this again. Looking at him all you could think about was how this Vulpix in front of you would be ultimately be digested and become the fat and muscle on your body. The thought left you sad for a moment; if things were different this Vulpix could very well have became one of your friends but in one strange way, won't he be with you forever?

Without a word you brought his paws up to your open mouth and slowly slid them in, noting that they had a salty, earthy taste to them. The Vulpix boy gave an anxious chuckle as he peered into your maw and exhaled sharply as he felt his paws hit the back of your throat. With a gulp, more of his arms disappeared down your throat and you were surprised to see the him get pulled closer toward you. Swallowing again, he was pulled nearer and now he was close enough that his face was right in front of yours. You could feel his hot, excited breath as he let out his final words. "It would be cool if you grew up and evolved into a Ninetales. I'd love to be a part of that." he said, surprisingly calm.

With your mouth full you looked into his eyes and nodded. Having only spent a few short moments with him you felt that the two of you had already reached the pinnacle of relationship with how intimate the act you were committing was; after all, how closer could one be? You wasted no time in pulling more of his arms into your mouth and with a big gasp, you pulled your jaws over his short muzzle. Your throat bulged as you pushed more of your maw over his face while the Vulpix boy did his own part and pushed onto you. Soon, his ears folded and you were up to his neck. His shoulders proved more of a challenge and you had to really force yourself down onto them but they managed to fill your throat too. While the surprising flexibility of your throat and jaw filled you with confidence, you were a little worried about the fact the Vulpix was uncomfortably blocking your airways. Bit by bit you swallowed hard, feeling more of his furry body disappear within you.

As your jaws finally passed his belly and reached his hinds legs you were able to lift him up, and just as Andre suggested, you used gravity to help you swallow your prey down by heaving him upwards. As the bulk of his hips passed your throat you were shocked at how he suddenly started sliding down, all six tails snaking down your maw. After a final swallow you gasped for fresh air as he cleared your esophagus and snugly eased his entire form into your stomach, adrenaline coursing through your system as your mind took a moment to comprehended what just happened. You just ate a Pokemon! Pressing your paws down on your massively distended belly you could feel the slight form of him just under your flesh.

While your throat and chest ached intensely the satisfaction of being full outweighed the pain, it made you feel powerful and the fact that he offered himself willingly made you feel even more contented. Collapsing on your back you couldn't get enough of tracing your paws along the contours he made on your belly, knowing full well that later on every part of his body from his head to his tails would be broken down and redistributed around your own. From the dull pleasured moaning that was making your insides vibrate, you were sure that he was enjoying it on his end, too. You sat in leaves for a while with the weight of your prey sitting on top of you, giggling at the sensations of the Vulpix squirming around.

You were so wrapped up in the Pokemon in your gut you failed to notice that another one had approached you. Tossing over on your side you could see that it was your Pikachu friend, Andre. "I see it all went well," he said. "So how does it feel?"

"I'm a little sore but it feels great! I can't believe it but I could probably get used to this," you replied while stretching out. Sneaking a look you could see that Andre must have picked up something to eat along the way, too, although it paled in comparison to how large your belly was right now. You doubt you could even walk like this and the wave of lethargy washing over you wasn't helping either. Perhaps an early morning nap was in order.

"Hey, want a belly rub?" Andre slyly suggested. "Or is that some post-meal tiredness I see in your eyes?"

True, the feeling of a full belly was making you pretty tired right now but you think that a belly rub might just be the thing to wake you up. Either way, from how Andre was acting you don't think he minds. What do you want to do?
11122111121121.title: First time for everything

choices: "I'm having second thoughts... Please let me out!"
111221111212.content:
For you, morning just couldn't come quick enough. You tried sleeping at first, but between Andre's snoring, and your excitement over what was to come, you found you couldn't. Eventually, you decided to try and sleep up against Andre's belly. You gave it a gentle rub, and Andre murmured in his sleep, but didn't wake up. His belly felt warm and soft to the touch, and you couldn't feel the buneary at all anymore. In just a few short hours, his stomach had reduced his willing meal into little more than pudge.

And soon he'll do the same to me... You thought to yourself, with a strange sense of happiness. With those thoughts in your head, you fell asleep, free to dream about what it was going to be like.

-------------------------

The next morning you awoke along with Andre, who seemed happy to see you.

"You know, if you wanted to sleep together you could have just asked." He chuckled, and then smiled at you. "Bet it was because you couldn't resist my belly." He added, patting his stomach.

"Hehe, yeah..." You blushed in response to his teasing.

As if on cue, Andre's stomach growled loudly. "Oops, guess my meal didn't last as long as I thought it would. Want to go get breakfast?"

"Um, about that..." Your blush intensified as you tried to come up with a good way to ask him. "I was thinking, maybe you could have um... me?"

"Wha? R-really?" Andre seemed very surprised. "Are-are you sure? You just learned about all this last night! There's no coming back once you uh... take the plunge." He looked at you very seriously.

You didn't think you could blush any harder, and yet, your cheeks got even redder than they already were. "Y-yeah. I spent all night thinking about that buneary, and what it must have been like for her. Warm and cozy, you just fall asleep, and then become a part of something greater. I-I have no idea why, but that sounds... amazing."

"You really are serious about this, huh?" He looked at you sadly, but he quickly discarded it for hunger...

"If that's what you want, I'd be happy to become your new home." And with that, Andre grabbed you, and hugged you tightly against his belly. He then brought your face up to his, and gave you an experimental lick. "Spicy. just like I thought." He observed. His hunger wouldn't wait however, and he began to open his mouth.

Andre opened his mouth wider and wider, until it completely engulfed your vision, and then he gently bit down. Your entire world was plunged into a warm, wet darkness, and you felt his tongue lapping over your face.

"Mmh..." You heard Andre's murrs of pleasure echo around you. Apparently you were really tasty. But he didn't linger long before pushing your face back further in his mouth. And then, with a resounding Gulp! you began your descent into Andre's hungry stomach.

With repeated swallows, Andre pulled you deeper and deeper, his tongue licking over every inch of your body along the way. It wasn't long before he reached your rump, and pulled it and your hind paws into his mouth, leaving only your tails sticking out of his mouth. It was only a second before he slurped them up as well, completely sealing you inside him. After a moment you finally made it all the way down his throat, and ended up in his stomach.

Buuuuurp! The once spacious stomach hugged you tightly, since Andre had just let all the air out. "Wow... you were the tastiest pokemon I've ever eaten!" You heard him say, muffled on the other side of the stomach wall. You felt him reach out with a paw and begin to gently rub you. "How are you liking it?"

"It's amazing... It's so warm in here..." You returned his rubs from the outside with your own internal massage.

"Cool, but uh... I may not have been completely truthful. I could let you back out right now, but I'm really hungry, so I don't think I will be able to hold back for long... You sure you want to stay forever?" You could hear a hint of worry in his voice.

It is amazing in here, you thought to yourself. But do I really want to become Andre's fat?

It seems It's time to make up your mind. What do you say to Andre?
111221111212.title: Ask Andre to... eat you.

1112211112121.content:
"It's so warm in here... I never want to leave." You reply with confidence.

"Alright then. Just sit back and relax, I'll take real good care of you." Andre says.

You comply and move to get comfy. You haven't even been here a minute, but you can already hear the stomach gearing up to process Andre's latest meal. To process you. You fall asleep for the last time, happy that you were able to give all of yourself to your new friend.

Andre climbed into his own bed,and began to get comfy as well. "Thank you for this, Kristina. I'll always remember you..." He gave his belly a final pat, and then drifted off to sleep.

Over the next few hours, Andre's stomach gurgled happily as it broke you down. You were swiftly turned into nutrients, and spread as fat on your friend's belly. By the time Andre would wake up, the only trace you ever existed at all would be a few dozen pounds you added to him.
--------------------------------

And thus, your adventure came to a close, with you willingly becoming another layer of fat on Andre's belly. Unlike most of his meals, Andre never forgot you, the vulpix who claimed to be human. He would remember the time you spent together, however short it was. But, you were always with him, so he never felt wistful for long.
1112211112121.title: "I want to stay forever."

choices: Andre quickly begins letting you out - after all, he promised!
It was too much effort eating you in and he is still hungry... too bad for you.
1112211112122.content:
Suddenly your mind reacts: you definitely don't want to go just yet! You've just arrived at this marvelous world and there seemed to be so much more to see...

"I... I don't want to go! I feel really good right here but...!" you manage to exclaim, the strong movements from inside Andre's stomach interrupting your line of thought and speech. You began to struggle in order to make your message more clear.

Andre seems surprised at the sudden movement from inside his belly. He was already kinda sleepy from the sudden feeling of fullness, so when you started screaming it came as a very big shock. Wasn't she already given up to you?

"Please Andre... I made up my mind... there's still so much I want to..."

The sounds from Andre stomach were already muffling your voice, he could barely get what you were saying but it was pretty clear you wanted out. Andre did promise that he would let you out right away but...

What was this feeling coming from him? The urge to keep you there? Was it just hunger or something else?

He would have to make up his mind pretty soon.
1112211112122.title: "I'm having second thoughts... Please l...

11122111121221.content:
Andre did not seem to react to your struggles. He seemed to be in a food coma of sorts, despite his previous experience in eating. Maybe it was just because of you? He had already laid down to rest before you were even able to struggle from the first time.

He promised to let you out if you wanted! Why was he doing this?

On the other hand, the Pikachu was enjoying this maybe a little too much. He had eaten many pokemon before you, but your amazing taste had left him mesmerized. You filled his belly so nicely and his stomach simply begged him to keep you there. To make you one with him, forever.

You quickly began to realize what had you gotten into - you were going to be made into food, nutrients, all of you would disappear and become a permanent part of the Pikachu that had eaten you. Being inside a stomach felt amazing, true, but was it really worth giving everything you were for the experience...? Considering this, it was pretty clear that you should just close your eyes and accept your fate. After all, you were sure your friend would take care of you, and whatever is left after the digestion process. Maybe being a part of a pikachu wasn't so bad...

No. You couldn't accept that, you had fallen for the temptation of doing this, but you knew you were meant to do more in this place. Maybe even eventually go back to the real world. With your newfound determination, you began to struggle even more.

But the stomach was quickly taking a toll on you. The heat was almost hypnotizing even by your fire-type standards, and you were already starting to feel very sleepy, just by being there. Your struggles were becoming ever so weak with every passing minute...

"Andre... please... I don't..." was the last thing you managed to say before you finally closed your eyes. All your body wanted to do was to rest, despite your struggles. However, in your last effort you managed to perform a somewhat good tackle, not that it would do much to the cushioned stomach walls but was still felt by your host.

In fact, that tackle had woken up Andre from his trance - he had eaten his new friend, and it was clear she wasn't willing to go any further! He quickly checked on you and you were not moving at all, maybe it was too late?

The yellow pokemon considered his promise, and decided he had to act quickly, or lest he would lose a friend. The pikachu quickly stood up and began the somewhat uncomfortable process of regurgitation - not very pleasant but he knew what to do. He began to cough you up, and you were slowly making your way up his throat into the outside world.

Eventually, the mouse pokemon discharged you to the ground with a bunch of stomach fluids - he quickly checked up on you and found you were ok, just sleeping and for what it seemed, very, very exhausted. The pikachu was left rather tired too - and very hungry. He quickly put you up in the bed again and left you to rest for a while, and after checking that you were indeed going to be okay, he had to get some breakfast after all and it would be rather rude to wake you up after such experience.

As for you, it was pretty clear that you would need to sleep for a while and recover from the whole ordeal.
11122111121221.title: Close Call

11122111121222.content:
Every passing moment in Andre's belly was making you feel more tired. Your body was giving in, no doubt about that. The heat and overall feeling of being trapped in the organic chamber was making you feel extremely tired, despite your newfound will to keep going in this strange new world. Your struggles didn't seem to be working, either.

Your orange fur was completely covered in stomach juices. A rather relaxing sensation but a very worrying one - if the pikachu did not let you out soon, it would be too late. Why wasn't he responding to your shouts? You clearly wanted out!

Andre did hear you pretty clearly about letting you out, but something inside of him stirred. He had eaten plenty of willing pokemon before, but none of them actually wanted to get out and were totally resigned to their fate. He hadn't given the option to get out before either, but he seemed to take a strong liking to you in the short time you just met. There was something about this situation, the sheer power of keeping you there - even against your will, that made him feel so good. His stomach needed you there, to fill it, to make you his.

He had taken a decision.

"Sorry Kristina... I don't think I'm going to let you out. I said it could be done but... I simply can't. You were the tastiest pokemon I've ever eaten, and I can't let such a meal go..." Andre said very calmy, and laid down on his bed again to enjoy your struggles even more.

What he just said left you paralyzed. How could he, after he promised?!

"Why?! You said you could let me o..." you couldn't finish the sentence after the stomach tensed up even more, Andre had let out a big belch that made your flesh prison feel even tighter. To the stomach, it didn't matter that you were a living creature, you were just another piece of food, and it always did the same to whatever comes inside it: melt it, break it down, then pass it to the intestines and filter the useful things you provided. The sensation was a bit... crushing, even in the literal sense.

"Hmm... so spicy. I kinda love this flavor..." he said without a care in the world, as if he just had eaten a bowl of berries instead of a living being. "I know what I said... but I simply can't let such a tasty piece of meat go... I'll need to have fire types more often...", he patted his belly and gave your form a rub, then relaxed again.

Every single word he said hit you like a brick. A piece of meat? Is that all you were now? The rubbing made you feel even worse, like if you were his property.

But it was really like that. You began to realize what you had done: by eating you, you simply ceased to be an individual being and started to be part of someone else: there was no need for you to be a layer of fat, just by being inside him you had given up your liberty and became someone else. Any passerby would look and see just a Pikachu, not two individual beings.

Now you were just meat, pokemon food ready to be processed into nutrients and fat for your host. You didn't have a will of your own, you were subject to whatever your new owner wanted, and in this case, since you were in his stomach, it was pretty clear all it wanted of you was to melt you away and become just fat on his hips, padding on his rear and expel out whatever he couldn't put to good use.

You began to cry. Is this really what you wanted from this? Maybe you were a bit too hasty in asking for him to eat you..

"Is that all I am... just... food to you?" you sobbed.

Andre didn't even reply. He had no reason to, after all, speaking to your stomach was kinda strange. He just began to doze off, totally engorged on his latest meal and impatient to chunrch it into nice, thick layer of fat... and with those thoughts, he fell asleep.

You were absolutely exhausted, even though you stopped struggling just to understand your situation. The stomach had taken its toll on you and you weren't even able to move, all your body begged you to do was to rest, and you just closed your eyes and began settling in... at least, you were able to give yourself to someone else. Your sacrifice wouldn't be in vain, you were going to be put to good use after all...

The snoring from your host started again. You concluded he didn't even pay more attention to you, after all, why would he? Did you really care about your food after eating, or you just wanted to take a nap, feeing it "go away" and then continue with your life? That was your last thought as your conscience faded away...

---------------

Andre woke up a few hours later. He had an incredible dream about finding the best food in the world an engorging himself with it. He suddenly saw the second bed he had made, and it hit him - he had eaten you and didn't let you out!

He quickly checked his belly, but it wasn't as round as it used to be... it was rather mushy, like he had just eaten a bunch of berries. It was pretty clear to him that you were beyond the point of no return. Suddenly, he felt a rather weak movement from his belly, maybe the last of you was still there...

And indeed, for some reason, you were able to hear and feel a little. You couldn't move at all, but you could still process what Andre said.

He began talking, not thinking you would be able to hear him, but to himself. "Kristina... I'm sorry. But I feel that this was what you really wanted. But hey, you're going to be a pikachu now... or a part of one. At least you're going to be always with me..."

And with that, since there wasn't anything he could do at this point, he fell asleep again and so did you. And this time, you didn't wake up again.

---------------

Andre sleep for another 6 hours. After waking up, his belly was back to normal, albeit he felt a little more padding in his belly. The vulpix had joined him for good, now just another layer of fat in his body. He began wondering if that was what she really wanted, but since you were a part of him, he decided that he would carry on for both of them. Even though he felt a bit guilty, this was the cycle of life - and your sacrifice would help him carry on living. Your adventure had come to an end.
11122111121222.title: A different way to go.

choices: You should investigate that guild more.
11122111122.content:
He stops in his tracks when he notices a sign that seems to be advertising a particular massage parlor nearby, an idea forming in his head as he turned back to you. “Hey! I happen to know somebody who’s just perfect at helping with this sort of thing! She’ll have these taken care of in no time!”

You do your best to slowly waddle after him, your belly dragging along the ground all the while, panting at just how stuffed you were. In fact, you even get stuck in the doorway to the massage parlor for a while, grunting as you tried to push your tummy through. Luckily, Andre was there to push against your rump, finally sliding you inside.

You glance around the parlor, and find… well, it looked similarly low-tech and medieval as Andre’s house. Apparently, these Pokemon didn’t have much modern technology. Still, it looked rather beautifully decorated, and upon trotting in, a tall, surprisingly beautiful mienshao smiled at the two of you.

“Oh, good afternoon there, darlings!” She smiles at the sight of customers, especially since she seems to already be familiar with the pikachu. She giggled a bit, seeing the sheer weights the two of you were hauling around in your swollen guts. “I take it you’re here for a tummy massage?”

“You bet, Asha!” He smiled, and you wait near the corner while he goes up and plops some strange-looking coins on the counter. “Ten minutes for me, and ten minutes for my friend here!”

“Of course, of course! Always love to see a new face. Coming right up!” With that, the mienshao happily proceeded into a back room, where there were little tables lined with that same soft pink wooly-stuff your beds were made out of. Andre happily laid on his back on one of the tables, and so, you did the same with the other.

“So, who shall be going first?” The mienshao asked, only for your belly to just then let out a big, long gurgle at the indigestion it was enduring. “Oh! I guess there’s our answer!” She smiled.

You were a bit embarrassed about all this, feeling like nothing more than a dog getting a belly rub. But the moment her hands touched your tummy, you realized that this was definitely going to be no ordinary belly rub! You almost gasped at how effortlessly her hands pushed down into that soft squishiness, shiting around the tightly-packed contents in just the right way.

“Oooh… oooh… aaah…” You were letting out the cutest little squeaks and gasps as she smiles and leans over you, sending her hands along your belly in careful, rhythmic movements, squishing it down in just all the right spots to make your tails wag.

“And that’s ten!” She smiled, suddenly pulling her hands away. Ten minutes, already? It just felt like a few seconds! Still, you looked down at your belly… and realized that it was much tinier than it had been before! She really had helped you digest all that food at an incredibly rate. “Now for Andre’s turn~”

“Be gentle, Asha. You should know my tummy has a little ‘guest’ tucked away inside~” Andre smiled, proudly groping his own belly, causing you to blush at how casual he was.

“Hehe! Of course! I’ll make their progression into pudge as smooth and easy as possible…~” Asha grinned back, before leaning over him and started to knead her fingers into his gut just as she had your’s. He was obviously far more used to the feeling, yet she still managed to edge some moans out of him.

You could only watch and blush fiercely at the sight of her putting her all into squishing and squeezing that sensitive gut, being gentle yet firm as can be. You didn’t know who to be more jealous of… her, or that buneary…

Eventually, before your very eyes, his stomach was starting to shrink! As if shifting into overdrive. In fact, as the minutes raced by, it seemed to shrink down almost completely, leaving him with just that regular potbelly he had when you first met him. You realize now that that buneary must be gone.

“There you go, darlings! I hope you enjoyed your massage~” The mienshao cooed, and as you crawled off the table, you realized you still felt… heavy. You soon realize that’s because this whole digestive process actually caused you to gain weight! Swaying beneath you was a sizable potbelly of your own, and your rump had gone from flat to rather round and soft!

The same applied to Andre, although you were too flustered to inspect his newfound pudge yet, especially knowing that that buneary girl added to it. You can only wonder how many Pokemon were part of his pudgy form, all forgotten about years ago…

“Of course, Asha! You’re the best, as always!” He replies as you walk out of the shop. Now much lighter, if still pudgier, he took a great big breath of the fresh air as he trotted back through downtown. “So, any other parts of town you wanted to see, Kristina?”

Thinking about it, you decided...
11122111122.title: Digestive Massage

choices: "Sure why not, could be fun" (so thankful red fur hides red cheeks)
11122112.content:
You can't help but stare at the squirming belly of the haxorus, "In a minute, I just.." you can't help but take a gulp. why was this son entrancing.

For his part Andre snickers a bit "First time seeing a predator in action huh?" he gently elbows you in the side. "It's a pretty common sight around town, especially around the eating contests. The prize is a willing snack after all," You swear he wipes a little bit of drool off of his mouth before continuing on. "Might as well introduce ourselves if we're going to watch the show."

You follow along a bit, feeling your cheeks flush red and almost being thankful you've got fur to hide the blush. As the two of you approach you notice a bright scarf tied around the dragon's arm. Up close you have to crane your head up just to look at the mass of muscle and blades before you. His belly squirms even more than before, causing the dragon to sigh in apparent bliss. Andre soon pipes up with no fear whatsoever of the beast "Hi there, I'm Andre and this is my new friend Kristina. I was just giving her a tour of the town and well she couldn't help but get a closer look at such a powerful looking predator." The little electric mouse gives a bit of a wave as the haxorus looks down at you.

The dragon crouches down a bit to get closer to your level "Heh, hey there squirts." Just being under his scrutinizing gaze "I'm Axle" Says the seemingly gentle giant as he extends a claw your way.

As you give it a shake you just have to ask, "Who did you.. you know.." you find yourself trailing off a bit still a bit embarrassed to be asking these kinds of questions.

"Heh, no one too important. Managed to snag an outlaw who was poaching grain shipments." Axle says with a grin " the darn mightyena never expected to come across someone who knew how to fight."

"An honest to Arceus adventurer!" Andre seems to be beaming as he looks up at Axle. "What's it like, constantly on the move and all that?"

For your part you just watch the conversation, both out of enjoyment at watching your new friends belly and to let Andre ask his questions

"Heh, we get to see all different parts of the world, and help all sorts of different mons who are in trouble." Axle smiles once more as he looks towards the ship before looking back to you, a sharp whistle rings out "speaking of, It's time for me to head out, by kiddos and if you ever need help don't hesitate to stop by the guild." The gentle giant waves as he heads off towards the ship.
